_source.short_desc: Myphoner is a cold outreach platform for B2B sales teams to follow up on prospects and close more deals in a simple and efficient way.
_source.long_desc:
Myphoner's fresh take on cold outreach enables teams to follow up on B2B prospects simply.

Whether your team does cold-calling, warm-calling, scheduling, inside sales it's all about following up. Myphoner's unique queue and scheduling system will let your team contact and follow-up with ease and efficiency.

Our unique set of tools make it easy to manage a team of any size from 5-80+, helping them focus on calls and managers cut their admin down.
_source.target_audience: Sales teams and agencies using telemarketing as (part of) their strategy.

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

category_features.name: Lead Capture
category_features.definition: Automatically identify and save contact information for potential customers

category_features.name: Lead Nurturing
category_features.definition: Develop relationships with potential buyers throughout their buying journey by providing helpful information along the way

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Score a lead on their quality or likelihood to buy based on certain behaviors

category_features.name: Lead Segmentation
category_features.definition: Divide leads into buckets based on predefined criteria and routing rules

category_features.name: Pipeline Management
category_features.definition: Tracking the effectiveness and configuring volume of sales channels

category_features.name: Prospecting Tools
category_features.definition: Identify potential leads based on predefined criteria and adding them to sales pipeline

category_features.name: Archiving & Retention
category_features.definition: Store call recordings into a more compressed form, usually in a separate location

category_features.name: Call Recording
category_features.definition: Allow businesses to monitor calls over multiple locations on different networks

category_features.name: Call Tagging
category_features.definition: Highlight specific time marks for annotation and review purposes

category_features.name: Event Triggered Actions
category_features.definition: Record calls based on customer behavior

category_features.name: File Transfer
category_features.definition: Secure file sharing between multiple endpoints

category_features.name: On-Demand Recording
category_features.definition: Record the audio of phone conversations for quality assurance purposes

category_features.name: Recording
category_features.definition: Record live calls to play later

category_features.name: Scheduled Recording
category_features.definition: Automatically record calls at predetermined times

category_features.name: Business Card/Badge Scanning
category_features.definition: Capture contact information by scanning a physical item and having the system automatically extract data from the scan

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Data Extraction
category_features.definition: Automatically extract information from documents or websites and input it into a database in a specified format

category_features.name: Lead Distribution
category_features.definition: Route and distribute your leads to third party buyers

category_features.name: Lead Notifications
category_features.definition: Receive an alert when new lead comes in

category_features.name: Lead Nurturing
category_features.definition: Develop relationships with potential buyers throughout their buying journey by providing helpful information along the way

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Identify which leads fit your target audience and are most likely to become customers

category_features.definition: Score a lead on their quality or likelihood to buy based on certain behaviors

related_products.short_desc: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that drives rep productivity on the world's #1 CRM platform.
related_products.features: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that has helped power the world's best sales teams on the world's #1 CRM platform. Firms of all sizes, industries, and geographies, realize value faster with Sales Cloud 360. With Salesforce Lead Management, set up automatic lead scoring and routing to ensure leads never fall through the cracks, and that the right sales reps follow up on leads while they're hot.

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Increase lead conversion rates by 300% with Zoho CRM's online, omnichannel lead management system for businesses of all types & sizes.
related_products.features: Zoho CRM helps businesses track prospects, boost lead conversion convert rates by 300%, and shorten sales cycles. Zoho CRM offers a centralized platform to manage lead history, management, distribution, nurturing, and segment high-quality leads based on trends and performance. Access dashboards and connect with your team in real-time with mobile-first features. Zoho CRM integrates with 40+ native apps and 500+ third-party apps.

related_products.short_desc: HubSpot CRM has everything you need to organize, track, and build better relationships with leads and customers.
related_products.features: Whether you've got a small team of five or a sophisticated sales force of 500, HubSpot offers pricing and packaging options that grow with you. HubSpot customer relationship management (CRM) software is built for companies that want to spend less time logging data. It keeps all your contacts in one centralized, customizable database. And you can see everything about a lead in one place -- no more digging through inboxes to find information. Start using the free HubSpot CRM today.

related_products.short_desc: Pipedrive is an easy to implement lead management software tool that helps you focus on the activities that drive deals to close.
related_products.features: Tracking leads and optimizing your sales pipeline has never been easier thanks to Pipedrives powerful yet agile lead management software. Focus on the activities that transform leads into customers while enjoying Pipedrives intuitive and simple design. In addition to being integrable with hundreds of supporting lead generation apps and integrations, our robust mobile CRM allows you to continue managing and converting prospects with full feature access on the go.

related_products.short_desc: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you -- everywhere you work.
related_products.features: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you by automatically combining your contacts, communication histories, email inboxes, and calendar appointments with over 250+ SaaS business app contacts and social media connections (including Linkedin, Twitter, Facebook) into one unified team relationship manager.

related_products.short_desc: 130,000+ customers in 170 countries use ActiveCampaign to automate their marketing, from contact management to email personalization.
related_products.features: ActiveCampaign's category-defining customer experience automation platform (CXA) helps over 130,000 businesses in 170 countries meaningfully engage with their customers. The platform gives businesses of all sizes access to 500+ pre-built automations that combine email marketing, marketing automation and CRM for powerful segmentation and personalization across social, email, messaging, chat and text. Over 75% of ActiveCampaign's customers use its 850+ integrations.

related_products.short_desc:
The smarter way for small businesses to do great work
Keap organizes your client information & daily work in one place, freeing you up
related_products.features: Grow your business with the all-in-one CRM, sales & marketing software for serious business owners. Our platform organizes your customer information and daily work in one place, freeing you up from repetitive tasks so you have more time to focus on growing your business.

related_products.short_desc: #1 CRM Software for managing lead flow.
related_products.features: #1 CRM Software For Lead Management - 100% Free Forever. Marketing 360 CRM gives you that ability to manage all your leads & customers in one place. Add as many team members as you need, create custom fields to store any contact information, assign tasks, track deals, and sales pipelines and so much more. Need help importing contacts and get live support that is included as well.

related_products.short_desc: NetSuite let's you manage your customers' entire lifecycles from lead all the way to fulfilment and beyond, all in a single place.
related_products.features: NetSuite provides a unified, 360-degree view of the customer including preferences, transactions, and interactions to enables sales, marketing, and support teams. With real-time visibility across the entire customer lifecycle-from lead all the way through opportunity, sales order, fulfillment, renewal, and support, NetSuite users have everything they need to deliver consistent and relevant experiences to their customers across all touchpoints.

related_products.short_desc: SharpSpring offers powerful, flexible lead management with fully integrated CRM and social media tools for easy lead management.
related_products.features: SharpSpring is a comprehensive lead management and marketing automation platform with robust features, functionality and performance. SharpSpring is one of the most flexible platforms on the market, offering powerful, behavior-based email marketing, native or 3rd-party CRM integration, dynamic forms, fully integrated social media management, and universal CMS compatibility, in addition to integration with hundreds of applications. SharpSpring is usually less than 1/3 the cost of the competition.

similar_products.short_desc: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that drives rep productivity on the world's #1 CRM platform.
similar_products.features: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that has helped power the world's best sales teams on the world's #1 CRM platform. Firms of all sizes, industries, and geographies, realize value faster with Sales Cloud 360. With Salesforce Lead Management, set up automatic lead scoring and routing to ensure leads never fall through the cracks, and that the right sales reps follow up on leads while they're hot.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based solution that helps businesses improve marketing operations with database management, task assignment and more.
similar_products.features: ZoomInfo combines the worlds most comprehensive business database with best-in-class technology to fuel your go-to-market strategy from start to finish, and provide an accurate, 360-degree view of customers, prospects, and opportunities.

similar_products.short_desc: Chili Piper is the most advanced routing and booking software, fueling high-growth B2B revenue teams.
similar_products.features:
Chili Piper is the leading inbound conversion platform fueling today's high-growth B2B teams. Its advanced routing and booking software enables fast speed to lead and efficient handoff, making it possible for sales and marketing teams to book meetings instantly and generate more revenue while spending less. 

Companies like Intuit, Twilio, Forrester, Spotify, and Gong use Chili Piper to double their inbound conversion rates and maximize revenue.

similar_products.short_desc: TigerLRM is an all-in-one Sales Enablement Software with tools for Content Management, Training & Coaching, In-Built CRM, and more.
similar_products.features:
TigerLRM is an All-in-One Sales Enablement Software with essential tools such as Content Management, Training & Coaching, In-Built CRM, and more!

Bring out the Tiger in your sales team with a highly intuitive, easy-to-use suite of Sales Enablement and CRM tools that help sales professionals focus on hunting and closing leads. TigerLRM comes fully equipped with built-in features and tools that cut down on sales guesswork and presumptions.

similar_products.short_desc: Outreach is the only solution to integrate sales engagement, conversation intelligence, and revenue intelligence into one platform.
similar_products.features: Do you have inbound leads slipping through the cracks? With Outreach Engage, leads are appropriately routed to reps and entered into personalized sequences that utilize proven playbooks & messaging. Help your reps more easily engage with potential buyers by orchestrating all key sales activities like email, phone calls, and social media touches.

similar_products.short_desc: Pipedrive is an easy to implement lead management software tool that helps you focus on the activities that drive deals to close.
similar_products.features: Tracking leads and optimizing your sales pipeline has never been easier thanks to Pipedrives powerful yet agile lead management software. Focus on the activities that transform leads into customers while enjoying Pipedrives intuitive and simple design. In addition to being integrable with hundreds of supporting lead generation apps and integrations, our robust mobile CRM allows you to continue managing and converting prospects with full feature access on the go.

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful, easy to use marketing automation software that helps generate qualified leads and translate marketing spending into revenue.
similar_products.features: Adobe Marketo Engage gives you a better way to identify and prioritize leads, provides more insight into your pipeline, and automatically nurtures leads through dynamic personalized journeys. Start by creating custom lead scoring models, then sync Marketo Engage with your CRM to unify marketing and sales teams. The integrated systems track each customer interaction, alerting sales when lead scores indicate readiness.

similar_products.short_desc: AI-powered Lead Management platform increases accuracy in prospecting, speeds up list building, & shortens your sales cycle. Try free!
similar_products.features: Advanced tech lead management platform powered by Artificial Intelligence! Now sales pros can build contact lists in minutes, using our revolutionary, real-time search engine for direct access to B2B Decision Makers. Unlike our competitors' stale, static databases, Seamless.AI differentiates with unique tech to aggregate and update accurate contact lists in real-time, as our users browse target account websites. Get 50 Free Lead Credits with New Signup or Request a 1-1 Demo with our sales team!

similar_products.short_desc: Freshsales is packed with features and a highly intuitive UI so that you don't have to juggle multiple tools to run your business.
similar_products.features: Freshsales is a full-fledged sales force automation solution for sales teams. It provides everything a salesperson needs to- attract quality leads, engage in contextual conversations, drive deals with AI-powered insights, and nurture customer relationships. With built-in email, phone, chat, and telephony, Freshsales empowers sales teams with more time for selling by automating the sales process and increases efficiency and productivity in their daily activities.

similar_products.short_desc: Close more leads in less time by following up with leads quickly and efficiently.
similar_products.features: ClickPoint is an all-in-one solution sales and marketing solution designed to help your salespeople reach more prospects. ClickPoint customers, on average contact, more than 50% of their leads, and many will contact upwards of 70%. ClickPoint provides one solution that makes it easy for salespeople to dial their prospects, while automated Texting and Email marketing reach customers at the right time in their buying journey. All of this comes together to make your sales team more successful.

similar_products.short_desc: Increase lead conversion rates by 300% with Zoho CRM's online, omnichannel lead management system for businesses of all types & sizes.
similar_products.features: Zoho CRM helps businesses track prospects, boost lead conversion convert rates by 300%, and shorten sales cycles. Zoho CRM offers a centralized platform to manage lead history, management, distribution, nurturing, and segment high-quality leads based on trends and performance. Access dashboards and connect with your team in real-time with mobile-first features. Zoho CRM integrates with 40+ native apps and 500+ third-party apps.

similar_products.short_desc: Sales Acceleration Platform for the world's largest Financial Services Institutions.
similar_products.features:
Vymo is the Sales Acceleration Platform for leading Financial Institutions across the world. It
solves for frontline personnel, sales managers and business leaders through mobility, insights
and industry playbooks. 

60+ global financial institutions have deployed Vymo to solve over 18 deep industry-relevant use cases ranging from allocating leads to the best-fit salespeople to identifying potential cross-sell opportunities and driving conversions.

similar_products.short_desc: amoCRM is the world's first messaging-powered CRM. It features sales pipeline, lead tracking, multichannel communication and more.
similar_products.features: amoCRM is the world's first messaging-powered CRM. Multi-channel communication lets you converse through messengers, emails and calls from a single app. Now every interaction with your customers can be a personalized one-on-one dialogue. Plus managers love our powerful analytics, reporting and automation tools.It's the perfect messenger-based sales solution for entrepreneurs and SMBs.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Channel Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Channel Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Channel Management software allows companies to streamline their distribution and sales efforts by organizing clients into specific segments and keeping track of marketing outreach and buying patterns. Specific types of Channel Management software focuses on partner programs. Channel Management software is related to Marketing Automation software, eCommerce software and Lead Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Commission software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Commission tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Commission software improves sales productivity by centralizing and automating an organization's commission-based incentive plans. Commission applications allow performance tracking and reporting among employees, calculation of commission compensation based on performance variables and the management of key dates in the company's sales or compensation cycle. Commission tracking software can also help manage regulatory reporting requirements related to compensation or bonuses. Commission software is related to Lead Management software, Payroll software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Management software provides powerful tools that enable storage, tracking, and management of contact information throughout an organization. Contact Management applications allow organizations to function more effectively by distributing current contact information for customers, contractors, vendors and others to all levels and locations of an organization. Contact Management solutions also often incorporate efficiency-increasing features such as lead management tools, employee task logs and customer interaction histories. Contact Management software is related to Campaign Management software, Lead Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Relationship Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Relationship Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software enables customer interaction, support and relationship management. The purpose of a CRM application is to enable organizations to better manage their customers through the introduction of reliable systems, processes and procedures. Customer Relationship Management software integrates organizational processes across marketing, sales and customer services. CRM software is related to Contract Management software and Online CRM software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Quoting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Quoting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Quoting software enables organizations to accurately calculate cost and price estimates quickly and efficiently. Quote Management applications also allow enterprise-wide distribution of quotes, enabling automatic pricing based on historical records as well as easy integration of localized factors, including customer profiles, case-specific terminology and sales tax rates. Many Quoting applications integrate directly with an organization's accounting activities, enabling the automatic conversion of price quotes to invoices. Quoting software is related to Accounting software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Referral software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Referral tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Referral software helps companies promote their service more effectively by using their customer base as a source for additional sales leads. Typical features of this software include referral tracking, reward distribution and testimonial management. Specific kinds of Referral software are targeted toward Human Resource departments and help establish employee referral programs and lower an organization's cost-per-hire. For related software solutions see Marketing Automation software, Lead Management software, Human Resource software and Customer Reference Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Force Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Force Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Force Automation software manages an organization's sales force functions which can include: lead management, customer account management, contact management, quote management, forecasting, customer demographics and employee performance management. Sales Force Automation applications improve sales productivity while providing a method of distribution for sales analytics throughout an enterprise. Sales Force Automation software is related to Commission software, Contact Management software, Lead Management software and Quoting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Tracking software enables businesses and sales teams to monitor pipelines, manage steps in the sales process, and track key performance numbers.

_source.short_desc: Contact and follow-up your leads with efficiency and ease. Our power dialer has all you need and is affordable and simple to use.
_source.long_desc:
Myphoner is a fresh new take on how software for outreach via phone and following up on prospects should be done. Our auto-dialer enables teams to make more calls using specialized strategies designed around your businesses unique needs.

Myphoner is more than an autodialer though, whether your team does cold-calling, warm-calling, scheduling, inside sales it's all about following up we've got you covered.

Contact and follow up your leads with efficiency and ease.
_source.target_audience: Sales teams and agencies using telemarketing as (part of) their strategy.

category_features.name: Automatic Call Distribution
category_features.definition: Distribute/route calls across call center employees

category_features.name: Call Recording
category_features.definition: Record the audio of phone conversations for quality assurance purposes

category_features.name: Call Scripting
category_features.definition: Provide agents with a typical response for common call subject matter

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

category_features.name: Power Dialer
category_features.definition: System automatically dials the next number on the contact list after the previous call ends

category_features.name: Predictive Dialer
category_features.definition: System calls multiple numbers at once and connects the agent to the first number that answers

category_features.name: Preview Dialer
category_features.definition: System provides callee information to agent prior to the call to help determine whether or not to make the call

category_features.name: Progressive Dialer
category_features.definition: System makes individual calls from a list as soon as the agent is available

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Call Center Management
category_features.definition: Manage all call center activities including call monitoring, call recording, call answering, call transfer, etc.

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

related_products.short_desc: GoToConnect combines Jive's VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's video conferencing into one simple, reliable and flexible solution.
related_products.features: GoToConnect (formerly Jive) combines cloud VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's web, audio and video capabilities into one simple, flexible solution. Users can meet, talk, and collaborate via web browser, desktop application, or desk phone with features ranging from virtual voicemail, and call forwarding, to secure video conferencing and screen sharing. For as low as $19.95 a month, GoToConnect eliminates the hassle and expense of managing multiple collaboration solution providers.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud contact center software that offers VR, skills-based routing, AI, call blending, and analytics.
related_products.features: NICE CXone Personal Connection is a patented dialer that generates more revenue and reduces hang-ups. As an Auto Dialer, it automates the process of making calls from an outbound contact center. CXone Personal Connection natively supports the following dialing modes: predictive (power), progressive, preview and agentless.?

related_products.short_desc: Gong enables revenue teams to realize their fullest potential by unveiling their customer reality.
related_products.features:
Gong enables revenue teams to realize their fullest potential by unveiling their customer reality. 

The patented Gong Revenue Intelligence Platform captures and understands every customer interaction, then delivers insights at scale, empowering revenue teams to make decisions based on data instead of opinions. 

Over 2,000 innovative companies like Paychex, PayPal, Hubspot, LinkedIn, MuleSoft, Shopify, Slack, SproutSocial, Twilio, and Zillow trust Gong to power their customer reality.

related_products.short_desc: Dialpad modernizes communication technology, putting voice, messaging, meetings, and video on any device.
related_products.features: Dialpad Sell is an effective sales dialer for sales organizations of any size. Dialpad Sell offers multiple real-time and post-call sales coaching features that drive efficiency. With features like Real-Time Recommendations, answers to common prospect questions pop up when specific keywords are mentioned during an active call. Direct integrations with other essential tools like Salesforce, G Suite and more means accurate activity logging, whether your reps are at their desks or out in the field.

related_products.short_desc: Agile CRM is a complete sales, marketing and service suite designed to let SMBs to sell and market like the Fortune 500.
related_products.features: Agile CRM Auto-dialer software helps Automate, streamline and manage your telephone outreach. Take customer interaction to the next level with Agile CRM's industry-leading power dialer feature. Select multiple contacts and dial them one-by-one, either automatically or manually.

related_products.short_desc: Five9 Cloud Contact Center - Predictive, Power, Progressive and Preview Dialers, Inbound, Chat, Call Recording, and CRM integrations.
related_products.features: Triple your live phone connections with Five9's Auto Dialer that outperforms other dialers available today. Intelligent algorithms ensure the next caller is available when the next agent is ready. Automate the dialing process, skip no-answers and busy signals, and spend more time talking to live leads, with easily adjustable dialing modes. Manage your lists and campaigns, monitor calls, report in real-time, coach agents and comply with TCPA. See why Five9 is the industry leader.

related_products.short_desc: Twilio provides simple, pay-as-you-go APIs for businesses to build scalable, reliable voice and SMS apps for the web or mobile devices.
related_products.features: Twilio is the worlds leading cloud communication platform that enables you to engage customers across channels - SMS, voice, video, email, WhatsApp and more. Pay-as-you-go APIs allow businesses to scale communications reliably.

related_products.short_desc: Dial more prospects and close deals faster with better quality calls that give your sales reps the upper hand.
related_products.features: Dial more prospects and close deals faster with better quality calls that give your sales reps the upper hand. Aircall's flexible sales dialer solution enables reps to dial multiple prospects automatically in a back-to-back queue, while surfacing crucial contact information directly in the phone interface. Join 6,000+ companies that trust Aircall to strengthen their sales outreach with first-class phone features like: CRM integrations, CTI, call coaching, call tagging, click-to-dial, and more.

related_products.short_desc: EngageBay is a simple, affordable all-in-one marketing, sales and service CRM software to acquire, engage, nurture, close leads.
related_products.features: EngageBay is a simple, affordable, all-in-one marketing, sales and service CRM software built for small businesses and startups to acquire, engage, nurture web visitors and convert them to happy customers. Acquire leads through lead generation forms and popups, engage web visitors through beautiful landing pages, nurture them through engaging emails, and automate your marketing funnel through marketing automation - all from one easy to use platform.

related_products.short_desc: Open source call center software w/ outbound predictive dialer. Also handles inbound & manual calls as well as email and web chat.
related_products.features: Open source contact center software with predictive dialer capabilities. Handles inbound, outbound, and blended phone calls, as well as inbound email and customer website chat.

related_products.short_desc: CloudTalk is a cloud-based phone system for support and sales teams. We make calling easy and fun! Get your FREE trial today!
related_products.features: CloudTalk's powerful auto-dialing software will have your agents handling more calls in less time. Over 2,500 companies - including DHL, Yves Rocher and Glovo - rely on CloudTalk for its superior call-quality and auto-dialing functionality. Make things easier for your sales and customer support teams with 70+ time-saving features and easy-to-setup integrations with your existing Helpdesk, CRM and eCommernce software. Try a 14-day trial, absolutely FREE.

similar_products.short_desc: Maximize your agents' efficiency with RingCentral's smart auto dialer to quickly connect customers with a live agent.
similar_products.features: Get a more efficient, effective contact center with RingCentral's auto dialer. Maximize your agent's productivity for a better customer experience, save money and time, and increase the likelihood of reaching successful leads.

similar_products.short_desc: Dial more prospects and close deals faster with better quality calls that give your sales reps the upper hand.
similar_products.features: Dial more prospects and close deals faster with better quality calls that give your sales reps the upper hand. Aircall's flexible sales dialer solution enables reps to dial multiple prospects automatically in a back-to-back queue, while surfacing crucial contact information directly in the phone interface. Join 6,000+ companies that trust Aircall to strengthen their sales outreach with first-class phone features like: CRM integrations, CTI, call coaching, call tagging, click-to-dial, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based power dialer. Reach up to 80 contacts per hour w/ NO awkward pause. No set up fees. Free trial (no credit card needed).
similar_products.features: Have More LIVE Conversations in 15-Minutes Guaranteed! We're so confident you'll boost outbound sales with our power dialer, you can use our full product for FREE without a credit card. Here's why we're confident: 1) Dial leads 4x faster 2) No awkward pauses after contact answers 3) Drop voicemails/emails in 1-click 4) Automate post call workflows 5) No special equipment needed. Powerful yet easy to use!

similar_products.short_desc: Our products include: Auto Dialer, Cloud Phone System, Progressive Dialer, CRM & Lead Management, and Email & SMS Marketing Automation.
similar_products.features: Ricochet360 is the All-in-One Auto Dialer, CRM/Lead Management, and Marketing Automation Platform that creates predictable revenue outcomes by automating 95% of your agents daily sales workflow. Designed for both inbound & outbound agents looking for a competitive advantage, Ricochet360 enables your team to call a new lead in less than one second, then automatically nurture and engage prospects throughout the entire sales process.

similar_products.short_desc: OnSolve One Call Now is a simple critical communications software for businesses to broadcast emergency alerts, send routine alerts.
similar_products.features: OnSolve's One Call Now, one of our market-leading critical communications products, enables groups and organizations of all sizes and types to quickly, securely and reliably distribute critical information to large numbers of people on virtually any device and network. OnSolve sends over two billion notifications annually and has provided more than 60 years of proven support to both the public and private sectors. We are in the business of helping our customers proactively keep people informed.

similar_products.short_desc: SpitFire Enterprise Call Center Software: Easy to Install, Operate & Upgrade. Agents can login for anywhere in the world on any device.
similar_products.features: What makes SpitFire different than other predictive dialers? SpitFire Enterprise is the only contact center software offering: Cloud, Premise or Hybrid call center solutions. 5 dialing modes: Predictive, Fixed Rate, Quick Connect, Preview & Manual Dialing options! Integrate your CRM or PBX or use the SpitFire API to fully customize your call center. OPC Marketing is all under one roof in Addison, Texas where we develop, we deliver and we support!

similar_products.short_desc: GoToConnect combines Jive's VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's video conferencing into one simple, reliable and flexible solution.

Users can meet, talk, and collaborate via web browser, desktop application, or desk phone with features ranging from virtual voicemail, and call forwarding, to secure video conferencing and screen sharing. For as low as $19.95 a month, GoToConnect eliminates the hassle and expense of managing multiple collaboration solution providers.

Start making calls in 3 minutes with no hardware and a 100% free trial.

Upload contact lists and let software dial for you. Unlock your sales rep's potential with Auto-dialers.

similar_products.short_desc: Dramatically increase contact and lead conversion rates with Convoso's omnichannel contact center software.

Our industry-leading Answering Machine Detection rate - 97% accurate - coupled with our new Caller ID reputation management initiative means your agents will connect with real people - and not flagged as 'Scam Likely'. Factor in our intuitively automated workflows and see your contact rates increase by 3-4X when you switch to Convoso.

similar_products.short_desc: Send calls and/or text messages to a list of contacts within seconds. Used by churches, non-profits and many other businesses.
similar_products.features: Looking for an Auto Dialer with no setup or hidden fees?  DialMyCalls is your choice, come see why we're used by thousands of organizations.   Our Voice Broadcasting platform lets you easily call a group of numbers in minutes.  We also call throttling and push to connect campaigns to allow call recipients to easily press a key to be connected back to the phone number of your choice.   No hardware required, our platform handles everything for you.

similar_products.features: Powerful agent-based Autodialer with no limits on simultaneous calls and advanced configuration possibilities such as different dialer speeds, call modi, customisable call limitations or timezone awarenesss. related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Appointment Reminder software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Appointment Reminder tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Appointment Reminder software helps reduce the number of missed appointments by automating customer notifications for appointment-based businesses.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Call Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Call Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Call Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer phone calls. These solutions enable better monitoring of the customer experience, workflow management and evaluation of employee performance. Whether designed for virtual or site-based locations, Call Center applications manage and catalog the process of customer calls and often allow customers to track the progress of their request via the internet. Call Center software is related to Customer Service software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Inside Sales software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Inside Sales tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Inside Sales software encompasses solutions that streamline the tasks involved in direct sales processes and includes a variety of power dialer applications, from predictive to progressive to voice messaging dialers. Inside Sales software boosts call volume, facilitates do-not-call compliance and allows sales agents to generate reports automatically, thus increasing sales team productivity. For related solutions see Sales Force Automation software and Predictive Dialer software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Predictive Dialer software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Predictive Dialer tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Predictive Dialer software automates matching and dialing of groups of telephone numbers for a variety of business or organizational purposes. Predictive dialers are frequently used in many types of out-bound call centers, as well as in some specific business applications such as lead management for sales or debt collection receivables. Predictive dialers feature sophisticated algorithms that enable the software to predict the viability of reaching a right party as well as routing that party to an available agent. Predictive Dialer software is related to Call Center software and Customer Service software as well as Debt Collection software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Telemarketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Telemarketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Telemarketing software automates customer outreach functions for sales and marketing call centers.
